lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.loan_because: I've received so much. Now it is time to give.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone who has the self motiviation to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people become better leaders.

lenders.name: Hugo
lenders.loan_because: Such as nice and easy way to make the difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Glenn n Damaris
lenders.occupation: Fast Food, Ice Crean n Pizza Biz
lenders.loan_because:
.
We can so we should..........
lenders.occupational_info:
.
It is twenty four + years now being self employed in the food industry.

I am happy I followed thru n fulfilled a childhood dream of being the "ice cream man". However, candidly,  I am un happy that I did not move on to other bigger, better, more challenging n rewarding things.

Now at the age of 58, I now realize I am a "one trick pony". 

However,

I do truly realize that it is better to be a one trick pony than a NO Trick Pony.......
.

lenders.name: Calvin
lenders.loan_because:
I am always a proponent of "teaching someone to fish rather than giving them the fish". I am intrigued by the Kiva idea and am excited to have the opportunity to help someone who has a dream, a plan, and the determination to become econmically independent. I dream about the world will one day be rid of poverty. I support any mean that will help us achieve this goal. Anyone who has the will to improve their standard of living deserves a chance, a helping hand, and a lot of love.

In addition, I will take great interest to see if I can make a good investor - by counting my repaid loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I make use of information through computer systems and programming.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: With the risk so small, and the potential to help so great, who could resist the opportunity to help others and make the world a better place?
lenders.occupational_info: Our university-affiliated projects help citizens and government to know the status of our water resources and ways that they can protect their quality and quantity.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I am thrilled to help other people start businesses of their own and experience the reward of supporting their families while enjoying the freedom of owning thier own business!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a bridal salon and sell wedding dresses.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
"Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love."
Lao-Tzu
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a library.

lenders.name: Wade
lenders.loan_because: I like that people are able to create better futures for themselves and others in their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an electrical engineering student and I tutor part time in math and engineering.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage initiative.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping businesses be more successful through developing their people.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I used to live and work with women in W. Africa; I want to continue to support the amazing work that I witnessed among my friends there.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility to help people who have fewer resources than I do. I am profoundly grateful for this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people in the United States who are facing the death penalty. Through extensive interviews, record collection and background investigation, I work to find information that will mitigate a sentence of death. I present the information I find to juries in an effort to convince them not to vote for the death penalty.

lenders.name: Andrew and Holly
lenders.loan_because: we want to set an example for our kids.
lenders.occupational_info: Holly teaches kindergarten and Andrew helps communities clean up pollution.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to have the opportunity to help fellow citizens of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I design custom furniture from sustainably harvested wood.  Taking care of the environment is very important to me. I hope the individuals I loan to will make a commitment to their environment since we all live in the same beautiful world.

lenders.name: One World One People
lenders.occupation: microfinance might be the solution to poverty
lenders.loan_because:
This organization is for the people  and that's a good thing, as it grows hopefully it will stay the same.
Good job everyone.

lenders.name: Monty H
lenders.loan_because: I feel that whilst I enjoy comforts of life, I understand many don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I help established companies realise their online potential.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: i want to help people. i know that my Kiva lends is helping people, their businesses, and that it is truly making an impact.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women across the globe.

lenders.name: judy
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: ... I care!
lenders.occupational_info: I take pictures of socially relevant topics to help generate awareness through my photographic work.

lenders.name: Chelsea
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy :)

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way to help out in the world

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Neale-Query family
lenders.loan_because: Generation by generation our family has been taught to give more than you receive.  Kiva is one of many ways that we can continue to work for others.  Money is like manure:  it doesn't do any good unless you spread it around.

lenders.name: aquelina
lenders.loan_because: I feel everybody should have a chance to grow and pursue their happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm always looking for ways to make people around me happy and appreciated. My work is rewarding and exiting.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I feel the only way to promote peace and understanding throughout the world is by allowing people the opportunity to succeed on their own.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children about compassion and giving. I design programs that allow them to become involved in helping less fortunate people in their community and around the world. In addition I work with adults and children who are struggling with reading and writing. I try to motivate and empower them. 80% of my job is working on improving self-esteem, 20% of my job is teaching.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: My parents suggested this site and gave me a head start.
lenders.occupational_info: I review and approve much larger loans for purchasing houses. Those loans are based on numerous set rules. I get to decide for myself where to lend money through Kiva.

lenders.name: Carol, Q and LA
lenders.loan_because: We all need to be involved with helping people who are doing something to better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Taking care of my family.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I know that I am blessed and I would like to pass those blessings on to others.

lenders.name: elaine
lenders.loan_because: I have 3 wonderful daughters and 2 grandchildren and know how lucky I am, and would like the opportunity to help someone else.

lenders.name: Steph
lenders.loan_because: I have lived with people in absolute poverty, and I can help make a little difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I use my position as an educator to teach young people about the inequality of the world's systems.

lenders.name: Swoloshyn
lenders.occupational_info: KINGSTON Ontario Canada

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: I think it's vital that we help one another.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Sales Manager for a Tea Company

lenders.name: Irma
lenders.loan_because: I can no longer wait for others to help. It has to start with me.  If I can help in any way possible, I would.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to mold young minds to become who they want to be.

lenders.name: Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: "In everything I did, I showed you that by this kind of hard work we must help the weak, remembering the words the Lord Jesus himself said: 'It is more blessed to give than to receive.' "  Acts 20:35

lenders.name: Janel
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a great life and want to give to others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep the financial records for small businesses.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant way to help advance the well being of motivated people who just need a little from us who are able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee the construction of condominiums and apartment buildings.

lenders.name: Traveling Chimps
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep young and grow old at the same time with sixth graders.

lenders.name: Miranda Family
lenders.occupational_info: Work in Software Industry

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that free markets are the best way to create wealth for the greatest number of people.  Free markets and capitalism, when properly applied, lift people out of poverty and increases the quality of life for people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise people on how to invest their money to maximize their returns and to reduce their investment risk.  My goal is to make sure my clients have plenty of money for a secure and comfortable retirement and to provide for their children's education and weddings.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because:
I own my own bussiness and understand the freedom and wonderful feeling of being responsible for your own well being
and to provide work for others, because of your business, is a blessing in itself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a custom commercial and residential interior and exterior painter. Who is starting school at 43 yrs old, to hopefully change to a new career. 15 yrs of painting is long enough for me.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I like empowering others to sustain themselves. Kiva is a wonderful way to share!
lenders.occupational_info: Finance

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: I think that if we can make a positive impact, even if it is small, we have accomplished our reason for being here.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Occupational Therapist.  I help people that have been injured or have a disease or illness return to as normal life as possible.

lenders.name: wayne
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner who started with a small truck and some brushes and now runs a very successful  painting company. I understand how much starting a small business can change someones life.  I want to give something back.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: How amazing it is to be able to help those that are trying to help themselves -- in another country!  I love it.  :)
lenders.occupational_info: Environmental Public Relations and Communications

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I'm interested in global economics, venture capital, and novel risk mitigation tactics

lenders.name: Gail and Grant
lenders.loan_because: It's a very little amount for us and it can make such a big difference to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small factory which embroiders and screenprints designs onto clothes. I have 10 employees.

lenders.name: Faisal
lenders.occupation: Asst. Dean at a Community College
lenders.loan_because: The honor, dignity and self esteem of my fellow humans is very important to me. I will do my part to fight poverty as long as I live.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a college to help educate our future leaders/learners to be better world citizens.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Well, this original loan was a gift from a friend for my Birthday.  I've never heard of Kiva before, but it seems like a great idea.  My wife, son and I are honored to be able to help others and hopefully, we can do more in the future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as part of a health care team helping individuals rehabilitate from injuries, illness, surgery.

lenders.name: Erick
lenders.loan_because: Money is best spent empowering people.
lenders.occupational_info: I design electrical devices for wireless communication.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a simple enough way to make a small difference

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the effort it takes in starting and maintaining your own business successfully.  A jump start for someone trying to support themselves and their family can make a world of difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the controller for a small business owned by my husband.

lenders.name: Colin Maggs
lenders.loan_because:
I think the idea of KIVA is so awesome... "help the world's working poor make great strides towards economic independence"

Mother Teresa said: "In this life we can not always do great things. But we can do small things with great love."

I am proud to be a part of such an organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an individual who believes that one can make a difference.

lenders.name: robert
lenders.loan_because: it empowers people and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people that are gravely ill.

lenders.name: Cameron King
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's part of Jesus' Great Commission to think and act globally as well as locally to bring His Kingdom into people's lives. It costs very little to make a huge difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a church to impact college students at WVU on a spiritual level; I help them mature in their relationship with Christ.

lenders.name: Simone
lenders.loan_because: I've always believed in the concept of micro-loans, admiring the efforts in Bangladesh, and to think that I can now directly participate is sublime. It's amazing.

lenders.name: Danielle & John
lenders.loan_because: It's a privilege and a joy to be able to help!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I admire everyone with guts to try.
lenders.occupational_info: I record day to day business transactions for a company that sells parking meters.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Japanese restaurant and hope to travel and teach English in many places around the world some day.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. If people were less self-centered this world would be a much better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I'll just say that my job is not one in which I am employed full time in helping people who are most in need. God willing, I'll be able to do this some day while being able to sustain myself.

lenders.name: ruth
lenders.loan_because: I need to help others.  Though I do not have a lot I can help a little

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: It does my heart good to see my money truly make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an innkeeper.  My home is a place where people come to enjoy a quiet and clean place to stay when they are travelling, or need a rest.    We also provide meals for them.

lenders.name: Joe&Skip&Mark&Yady
lenders.loan_because: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.  -Anias Nin
lenders.occupational_info: Sometimes when I reflect back on all the beer I drink I feel ashamed. Then I look into the glass and think about the workers in the brewery and all of their hopes and dreams. If I didn't drink this beer, they might be out of work and their dreams would be shattered. Then I say to myself, 'It is better that I drink this beer and let their dreams come true than be selfish and worry about my liver.  -Jack Handy

lenders.name: Osay
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part in creating balance in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My worK is at a Prison in Pennsylvania but my job is to show the world what I see through my music

lenders.name: Lucinda
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful and simple way to be able to support people create better lives for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hands on healer.  My goal is to help individuals heal, while giving support and encouragement, so they feel empowered to make better choices for their own well-being

lenders.name: Jacquie
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to help people and at the same time feel connected to them.  I can see their faces and know the money I give is really helping.
lenders.occupational_info: I am semi retired, a private pilot and an artist

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the free market system and Kiva provides me with a way to help others by helping them to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a computer programmer at a major university.  Now I am retired and travel around the US fulltime in my motor home.

lenders.name: Jen & Gerry
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Jen is a teacher of 11 to 13 year olds.  Gerrys is an Engineer in computer controlled equipment.

lenders.name: Russ
lenders.loan_because: Through international mission trips, my eyes and heart have been opened to those aspiring to better their lives.  I have seen in them an amazing spirit of happiness and hope that defies the conditions in which they live.  Kiva provides the ingenuity to invest in this spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: The bank I work for makes loans to companies owned by individuals who in many ways are not unlike those helped through Kiva.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It's easy to do; I like the idea of helping someone; I can afford to make these small loans; I feel more connected with the rest of the world when I take part in this; the richer western world is obligated to share its wealth with people in poorer countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for magazines and newspapers (often about motorcycles and motorcycling), I take photographs, I travel and write about my experiences, I help other people by fixing their writing.

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, even if I help one person or family at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create osteopathic medical education curriculum that is used to teach medical students and residents (doctors-in-training).

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I would love to make a difference in other peoples lives.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I think this is such a great idea.

lenders.name: ANDY AND RACHEL
lenders.loan_because: WE RECEIVED GIFT CERTIFICATES FROM A FAMILY MEMBER FOR CHRISTMAS, WE APPRECIATE THE OPPORTUNITY TO HELP LESS FORTUNATE BECOME SUCCESSFUL.
lenders.occupational_info: WE SELL AND FINANCE HOMES.

lenders.name: Alexa

Through this organization we can see how even 25 dollars can help someone else fulfill thier own dreams an goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Art Education

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: By helping others I receive the pleasant benefit of paying back  for the space that I occupy on this planet. And so it is!

lenders.name: linda
lenders.loan_because: I am so thankful for my family and all of the good people and times I have had.  It is good to give back,to help others with their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hospice nurse.  I help people to be comfortable and peaceful at the end of life

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be in a position to help those less fortunate and who don't have the opportunities I've had.

lenders.name: Linda, Toronto, Canada

lenders.name: Katie

"A  life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives" - Jackie Robinson

" Be the change you want to see in the world" - Gandhi

lenders.name: Joseph

lenders.occupational_info: I help companies that produce video games run their businesses and find work.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help people.

lenders.name: Lyn
lenders.loan_because: I recieved a certificate for a gift.

lenders.name: Mark Chow
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Lisa

lenders.name: Jeff & Melissa
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us.
lenders.occupational_info: lawn care - fertilization and weed control of lawns and flowerbeds

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all need someone, or something, at sometime. It's a wonderful opportunity to help those who are trying so hard to make a better life.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We help small & medium enterprise raise money.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: It matters

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I can and should... and because a kind friend got me started. :)

lenders.name: Jack and Linda

lenders.name: Steve

lenders.name: Ben

lenders.name: Karen

We assist them in all phases of spa development, from design to opening and managed services after becoming operational.

lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to live a comfortable life and the least I can do is help give others the same opportunities that I have.

lenders.name: Teresa

lenders.name: Rahni

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: everyone should get a chance to make a better life for themselves, and their loved ones

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a school district and I help children and families be successful through many different projects and activities.

lenders.name: Karen and Glenn

lenders.loan_because: Christmas Gift 2007; I care for .people all
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer and enjoy many a quadcore! I teach kids how to be successful in their life!

lenders.loan_because: I want to use some of our financial blessings to help others become self sufficient and more.

lenders.name: Sophie and Ani

lenders.occupational_info: We go to school in San Jose, California and are in the 5th and 3rd grade.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: It's a great idea to be able to help on a personal level. I've appreciated the encouragment I've received in my lifetime and it's good to give it back. We are all connected to each other in this world.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to find a good way to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Sonia K
lenders.loan_because:
It's good to know that even a small loan can make a big difference to somebody in need.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: I want to improve the quality of life for people in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create images that inform people about the world around them.
